languages.text: ...повелеть прощупать путь Идире Тласс. Каковая есть нечестивая псайкерша, но даже столь темные души подчиняются воле Лорд-капитана.
...to have Idira Tlass feel out a course. An unholy psyker she may be, but even souls as dark as hers submit to the Lord Captain's will.
languages.original_text: ...повелеть прощупать путь Идире Тласс. Каковая есть нечестивая псайкерша, но даже столь темные души подчиняются воле Лорд-капитана.

traits.locale_text: ...to have Idira Tlass feel out a course. An unholy psyker she may be, but even souls as dark as hers submit to the Lord Captain's will.
...to have Idira Tlass feel out a course. An unholy psyker she may be, but even souls as dark as hers submit to the Lord Captain's will.
...to have Idira Tlass feel out a course. An unholy psyker she may be, but even souls as dark as hers submit to the Lord Captain's will.
...to have Idira Tlass feel out a course. An unholy psyker she may be, but even souls as dark as hers submit to the Lord Captain's will.

languages.text: ... hacer que Idira Tlass percibiera un rumbo. Por mucho que sea una psíquica sacrílega, incluso almas oscuras como la suya acatan la voluntad d{mf|el|e la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}.
languages.original_text: ...to have Idira Tlass feel out a course. An unholy psyker she may be, but even souls as dark as hers submit to the Lord Captain's will.

traits.locale_text: ... hacer que Idira Tlass percibiera un rumbo. Por mucho que sea una psíquica sacrílega, incluso almas oscuras como la suya acatan la voluntad d{mf|el| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}.

languages.text: ……让伊迪拉·特拉斯探索前进的路线。或许她确实是位邪恶的灵能者，但即便是像她这种邪恶的灵魂，也会服从于舰长大人的意志。
languages.original_text: ...to have Idira Tlass feel out a course. An unholy psyker she may be, but even souls as dark as hers submit to the Lord Captain's will.

traits.locale_text: ……让伊迪拉·特拉斯探索前进的路线。或许她确实是位邪恶的灵能者，但即便是像她这种邪恶的灵魂，也会服从于舰长大人的意志。

languages.text: ...イディラ・タラースに航路を感じてもらった。不浄の異能者である可能性もあるが、彼女ほど暗い魂でさえもロード・キャプテンの意志に従うのだ。
languages.original_text: ...to have Idira Tlass feel out a course. An unholy psyker she may be, but even souls as dark as hers submit to the Lord Captain's will.

traits.locale_text: ...イディラ・タラースに航路を感じてもらった。不浄の異能者である可能性もあるが、彼女ほど暗い魂でさえもロード・キャプテンの意志に従うのだ。

languages.text: ... Idira Tlass eine Vorgehensweise erspüren zu lassen. Sie mochte zwar eine unheilige Psionikerin sein, aber selbst so dunkle Seelen wie sie beugen sich dem Willen des Lord Captain.
languages.original_text: ...to have Idira Tlass feel out a course. An unholy psyker she may be, but even souls as dark as hers submit to the Lord Captain's will.

traits.locale_text: ... Idira Tlass eine Vorgehensweise erspüren zu lassen. Sie mochte zwar eine unheilige Psionikerin sein, aber selbst so dunkle Seelen wie sie beugen sich dem Willen des Lord Captain.

languages.text: ... de demander à Idira Tlass d'établir un itinéraire. Bien qu'elle soit une psyker impie, même les âmes aussi sombres que la sienne se soumettent à la volonté {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.
languages.original_text: ...to have Idira Tlass feel out a course. An unholy psyker she may be, but even souls as dark as hers submit to the Lord Captain's will.

traits.locale_text: ... de demander à Idira Tlass d'établir un itinéraire. Bien qu'elle soit une psyker impie, même les âmes aussi sombres que la sienne se soumettent à la volonté {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.

languages.text: ...İdira Tlass'ın olanları sezmesini istedi. Kutsala saygısı olmayan, ruhunu karanlığa teslim etmiş bu ruhsezer dahi Lord Kaptan'ın iradesine boyun eğiyordu.
languages.original_text: ...to have Idira Tlass feel out a course. An unholy psyker she may be, but even souls as dark as hers submit to the Lord Captain's will.

traits.locale_text: İdira Tlass'ın olanları sezmesini istedi. Kutsala saygısı olmayan, ruhunu karanlığa teslim etmiş bu ruhsezer dahi Lord Kaptan'ın iradesine boyun eğiyordu.
